title: Children of the long-beaked bird
creator_credit: John Hoskyns-Abrahall, Burton K. Fox, Amanda K. Fox, Peter F. Davis, Sveriges television and Bullfrog Films
brief_description: The lifestyle of American Crow Indians living on reservations and preserving their traditions. In particular, the film follows the daily activities of Dominic Old Elk, the great-grandson of George Armstrong, Custer’s Indian scout. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
creator_credit_for_label: John Hoskyns-Abrahall, Burton K. Fox, Amanda K. Fox, Peter F. Davis, Sveriges television and Bullfrog Films
